sentences.english: Bill sing the verse and everyone joined in the chorus.
sentences.chinese: 比爾先唱獨唱部分，然後大家一起合唱。

sentences.english: The audience, which was most enthusiastic applauded the soloist.
sentences.chinese: 極爲熱情的觀衆爲那位獨唱演員熱烈鼓掌。

sentences.english: Poem of the Motherland, cantata for 5 soloists, chorus & orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 爲獨唱5，合唱隊和管絃樂隊而作的祖國史詩康塔塔。

sentences.english: Singing both solo and acappella with rich harmonies was also part of the slave heritage.
sentences.chinese: 獨唱和伴隨着豐富和聲的合唱也是奴隸傳統的一部分。

sentences.english: Thus, he is the biggest-selling solo artist in the history of classical music.
sentences.chinese: 因此，他是在古典音樂史上最暢銷的獨唱歌手。

sentences.english: The man in the tights sang alone, then she sang alone.
sentences.chinese: 那個穿着緊身綢褲的男士曼聲地獨唱，然後她和唱。

sentences.english: In 2005, guitarist Joe Perry released his eponymous solo album.
sentences.chinese: 在2005年結陰沉佩裏公佈他的名字命名的獨唱。

sentences.english: When there is only one singer to sing a song, we call his performance as a solo.
sentences.chinese: 當只有一個演員唱歌，我們稱其表演爲獨唱。

sentences.english: The soundtrack was released in 1986 as her eponymous solo album.
sentences.chinese: 年這些電視配樂以恩雅的名字命名作爲獨唱專輯發行。

sentences.english: Aria, a song that is sung by one person in an oratorio.
sentences.chinese: 清唱劇中的一曲獨唱，彷彿清澈江洋中那一波激流。

sentences.english: Her latest solo album has made her very famous in the world of pop music.
sentences.chinese: 她最近的獨唱專集使她在流行樂壇名聲大振。

sentences.english: Finally, it must be realized that "solo" Scriptura ignores reality.
sentences.chinese: 最後，我們必須瞭解，”獨唱”聖經忽略了現實。

sentences.english: Wu sang the song "Hope" after the crowd asked him for an encore.
sentences.chinese: 在觀衆的要求下，吳伯雄還獨唱了一曲《希望》。

sentences.english: He served as solo singer and lecturer in Tianjin Song and Dance Theatre.
sentences.chinese: 曾在天津歌舞劇院任獨唱演員及教師。

sentences.english: I'm singing the solo and I want to see you there.
sentences.chinese: 明天將來誥日是我獨唱，我盼望能看到你們。

sentences.english: The soloists were ably supported by the University Singers.
sentences.chinese: 這些獨唱歌手得到了大學歌手的大力支持。

definition: type of opera from Taiwan and Fujian
Wakin Chau (1960-), HK-born Taiwanese singer and actor
